item.title: I'm Sorry Update #7
item.description: I will have to apologize, i dind't secure server properly and it got hacked, so he deleted everything, so i had to recrate everything from scratch, im really sorry for that, i will try to make it better and more secure... Added Autosort plugin Fixed some exploits Updated server Added new security measures Improved backup system (periodic backups to new nvme drive that will be secured from system) Banned few countries/continents: Russia, China, Africa, Antarctica because of high hack attempts from there (mostly vpns) Forked pv-reminder and improved it Better TAB Improved performance Switched from Paper to Purpur Fixed Issues with plugins So after reset only spawn was present, so i left it in this server for nostalgia of old times :) I'm planning of forking authme and Protoclib to make it better secured and more lightweight I'm really sorry...
